title: paxaman
author: paxaman
content: Sorry If this is not the place to post this.Did anyone have any experience with mrSloty.com? there are a lot of sportbook markets, but cannot find to much info about that bookie.All I found is that the withdrawals takes a lot of time, bout 14-20 days

Going through Mrsloty it looks like good number of local leagues have been listed. If the preference is to spend on popular leagues, you can go with the trusted sportsbook available in our forum. You can use the best that suits your requirement, and majority have got instant settlement on bets as well as instant withdrawal supported.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I checked the site review on Trustpilot: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.mrsloty.comIt was very poor and not recommendable.Click on the link if you want to check people's comment about the gambling site, but the rating alone has already shown how the gambling site should be avoided.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: paxaman on September 28, 2022, 07:28:51 PMSorry If this is not the place to post this.Did anyone have any experience with mrSloty.com? there are a lot of sportbook markets, but cannot find to much info about that bookie.All I found is that the withdrawals takes a lot of time, bout 14-20 daysYou are on the right place. But you aren't going get much information about them from bitcointalk community. You are the first person who has mentioned this casino name in this forum. Anyway, the review of mrSloty.com looks really bad on Trustpilot. There are 213 reviews, almost 95% reviews are related to the complaints of their service. Most of the issues are related to withdrawal delays. Therefore, you have chosen a wrong sportsbook.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I guess no one from "Bitcointalk" knows these site.It's my first time to see someone asking/mentioning "MrSloty" casino, my best advice never playing on any un-popular casino to avoid some case. In-case about "TrustPilot" who share by fellow member bitcointalk.I still never trusted "TrustPilot" review even the review is good with 4-5 star. The reason, because you can pay a review service to boom server for gain a higher star review. So try to find a review from user experience in forum rather than using trust pilot.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: paxaman on September 28, 2022, 07:28:51 PM<snip>I'm not even familiar with the name. Since it has a very low review score, you should consider thinking twice before making any deposits to that casino.Now if you are looking for sports bookmakers online, you can find some of them here in Bitcointalk since there are also good numbers of them that introduced their site here. Just hover through the Gambling board.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: paxaman on September 28, 2022, 07:28:51 PM~Did anyone have any experience with mrSloty.com? I know nothing about this gambling site, and like you, I have not found much information about it online. The only real lesson that I learned from my brief search for information about this gambling site is that it’s incredibly difficult to find good information about the site. Therefore, it is hard say if this site really is legitimate or fraudulent. I also noticed that they have some bad reviews on Trustpilot, which is never a good sign. Although TrustPilot is not a best source of unbiased reviews, but still I think it is better to look for a more respectable casino to play at. There are plenty of other online gambling sites out there that are much more trustworthy and reliable than this one, so if you want to play casino games then I would recommend looking elsewhere.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Not familiar with the site but reviews about this site is not good at all and having that delay in withdrawal is already a red flag to me. Better to use the top sportsbook site than to bet on unfamiliar site with a lot of negative reviews, if you don’t want to experience any problem in sports betting then I suggest to avoid that site and go for the best option.

comments.body: 14/20 days for a withdraw its a nightmare and I think its really hard finding similar sites with that timeline.Fiat casino most of the times take 24/48 hours.Crypto casinos are able to process instante payout...By the way, I think there are many many other options before try a casino like this.I have find this resume of their activitieshttps://www.sistersite.co.uk/mrsloty-casino/

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: paxaman on September 28, 2022, 07:28:51 PMAll I found is that the withdrawals takes a lot of time, bout 14-20 daysThe fact that you got that information based on your research, that's already enough reason not to use the site. Even for let's say they are legit, the withdrawal time period is horrible. I don't see any reasons why withdrawal should take up to 3 weeks before it will be processed.  Even for manual payouts processing, that shouldn't take about a week.There are many reputable bookies here to choose from. Shift your attention to those sites instead.
